Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Ashland
ShortDescription: #79 79th buses are rerouted in both directions via 79th, Ashland, 76th, Damen and 79th, then resume normal route, due to police activity near 79th/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Ashland, 76th, Damen and 79th, then resume normal route, due to police activity near 79th/Ashland. 

Allow extra travel time.
